about_the_game:
Macaber Zealot is a lily mystery adventure game, which is independently developed by [Denghua team].
Most of the game, including the script, programming, art design and UI, is in the charge of the producer: @ABurns.
Background production: @Juechaixin (Bilibili, Weibo)
This is the first game we’ve ever made, and we hope to bring the players a story composed of love and hope, let the players feel the beauty from their stories. Nothing could be better if we could convey them to you!

We welcome players who support "Macaber Zealot" to join the discussion group: 834613051, the latest word of the game will also be released in the group at the first time. We are looking forward to your arrival!
At the same time, we have created accounts on multiple platform: @Denghuashe (Weibo, Bilibili, XiaoHongshu)
Subsequent information and derivative works of the game are only available above.

Ps. Learn more about the games below to improve your gaming experience

[Game related]
We have full Chinese dubbing, nine characters, two endings, and a perpetrator's perspective.


The game includes two kinds of options, which are "normal option" and "ending option".


The "Normal option" is in white font and affects the clues the player receives, but does not affect the ending. You can go back to learn all the options and experience the full story of the game.


The "ending option" is in red font, and affects the ending, it is recommended for the players to go back to experience different endings.

At the same time, there is a "return text" option in the game, which is in blue font. You can click it to the previous option branch, and choose the "normal option" which has more clues.


The story part of the game has no horror elements, which is suitable for players of all ages.
The investigation part involves the depiction of a bloodiness, dead body, which may cause discomfort, so we will ask the players if they skip the investigation part before entering (please don’t worry because the key details will be summarized and listed after you skip the game).


If you take advantage of the rewind function, you can experience the full story and full computer graphics collection in one game round.
After unlocking the whole endings and computer graphics, the game will open up the perspective of the perpetrator.

Ps. The options may still contain some branches, please check carefully for fear that some computer graphics or stories are missed.

Contact information of the producer: @ABurns (Weibo, Bilibili)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win7
  • Processor: x64 or x86
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: Taniharazo, who lost his memory, wakes up from the forest and goes deep into an isolated school, working with eight girls with different characteristics. ​The girls are happy together, but as one of them disappears, the serial murders gradually unfold ​But is the purpose just to find the murderer?
